about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Over 60 years of expertise in the welding and cutting industry
about.historyText1: Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd. grew from the strong foundation of Yongkee Liap Heng Co., Ltd., a pioneer as the first oxygen gas producer in Thailand. Operations within the Laemthong group began in 1966, expanding into "Laemthong Syndicate Co., Ltd." in 1990 to become a full-scale leader in welding and metal cutting technology.
about.historyText2: With over 60 years of accumulated expertise, we are the trusted specialist as the first and largest authorized distributor of HARRIS brand products in Thailand. We also curate high-quality innovations and industrial products from leading global brands, offering comprehensive solutions ranging from automatic metal cutting machines and welding electrodes to consumables for all types of engineering work.
about.historyText3: Our success is driven by the vision of Mr. Thong Laoboonmee, Chairman of the company, who made history as the first Thai national to be honored as a Life Member of the American Welding Society (AWS). With over 35 years of collaboration with the society, we are committed to delivering solutions that are precise, safe, and highly efficient — serving as a sustainable partner for Thai industry.
about.missionText: To deliver high-quality products at competitive prices, backed by excellent after-sales service, supporting the growth of Thai industry.
about.reason1Desc: As a direct importer from manufacturers, we offer the most competitive pricing in the market.
about.reason2Desc: Our experienced technicians provide maintenance, repair, and consultation services.
about.reason3Desc: We exclusively carry products from internationally certified leading brands.
about.reason4Desc: Our dealer and service center network covers the entire country.
about.milestone1Desc: Established in Bangkok as welding equipment importer
about.milestone2Desc: Became authorized dealer for leading global brands
about.milestone3Desc: Built dealer and service network across Thailand
